org.kohsuke.ajaxterm

Class PtyProcessBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kohsuke.ajaxterm.PtyProcessBuilder

  • public class PtyProcessBuilder
extends Object
    ProcessBuilder for launching a child process with pseudo-terminal.

    A pseudo-terminal is a special kind of pipe, so when we launch a new child process with a Terminal, a special kind of fork needs to be used, hence this class and not the standard ProcessBuilder.

    Author:
    Kohsuke Kawaguchi
